long_description: The versatile BOB Sport Utility stroller is built for off-road strolling, so you can take your child with you on your jaunts that happen to venture off the beaten paths. Made with a tough frame and durable fabric for lasting use; 2-step folding design supplies convenient transport and storage. 16 in. fixed front wheel allows for great stability when hiking, jogging or on uneven trails; hand-operated brake lets you decelerate quickly. Sturdy, high-impact polymer wheels are outfitted with knobby tires for excellent all-around traction; front wheel tracking is easily adjusted to ensure straight rolling. Padded and adjustable reclining seat offers great seating comfort; 5-point padded harness keeps child secure. Multi-position canopy can be adjusted for protection against the elements; large viewing window on top lets you keep an eye on the passenger. Internal seat pockets offer secure space for snacks and toys. Store extra clothing, food and more with the large seat-back pocket and Low Boy undercarriage cargo basket. Adjustable suspension system smooths out bumpy terrain and supplies a comfortable ride for the passenger. Accessory adapter allows for quick and easy attachment of BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter (sold separately). Foot-actuated rear wheel parking brake on the BOB Sport Utility stroller ensures the stroller stays put until you're ready to roll.
short_description: The versatile BOB Sport Utility stroller is built for off-road strolling, so you can take your child with you on your jaunts that happen to venture off the beaten paths.
